item.description:
Come meet your fellow "Route 9 Rubyists".Â We'll have sandwiches, salads, soda and beer for your enjoyment, so come on by after work, and bring a friend! (just let me know about your +1/+2/etc. on the RSVP, please)

For our first gathering, I'm saving most of our time for meet 'n greet activity so that we can get to know and reconnect with our fellow Rubyist. We'll also have some time for a few short "micro-talks" -- 10 minute (max!) presentations on a Ruby-oriented topic as a way to help us learn about what's hot and interesting in each others' Ruby worlds. If you'd like to give one of these micro-talks, please email me (darren.torpey@gmail.com) and I'll schedule you in.
item.name: Inaugural Route 9 Ruby Meetup
